org.fluentjava.reflection
Class Mirror

java.lang.Object
  org.fluentjava.reflection.Mirror

public class Mirror
extends Object

A class that that provides reflective facilities over an object. Throughout the documentation, we refer to the subject of reflection as mirrored object. A mirror can be privileged (with access to private methods and fields) or unprivileged (without).

invoke

public Object invoke(String methodName,
                     Object... args)
Invokes any method by only knowing its name and a set of arguments. To know more, see ReflectiveInvoker.invoke() and ReflectiveInvoker.priviligedInvoke() if the mirror is priviliged.

Parameters:
methodName -
args -
Returns:
